snippet: Julie Klausner’s podcast “How Was Your Week?” is a mix of riffing and interviews that has a literate sensibility.
abstract: Julie Klausner comedy podcast How Was Your Week? stands out among the proliferation of other comedic video productions of 2012.
lead_paragraph: Julie Klausner’s podcast “How Was Your Week?” is a mix of riffing and interviews that has a literate sensibility.

headline.seo: Julie Klausner’s Podcast, ‘How Was Your Week?’
headline.main: A Podcast That Has Old-School Smarts
headline.print_headline: A Podcast That Has Old-School Smarts
